snippet.title: Paper Beast - Sandbox Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
New trailer reveals total player freedom of sandbox mode for Eric
Chahi’s VR game Paper Beast.
Sandbox mode expands on Paper Beast’s dreamlike story and gives
players total freedom in spawning fantastic creatures, influence
weather, shape the environment, and experiment with its in-depth
physics engine.
